articles.title: Ovechkin’s pursuit of Gretzky’s goals record hot topic on ‘NHL @TheRink’ podcast - NHL.com
articles.description: Senior writer Gulitti following Capitals around North America, joins co-hosts to discuss epic chase
articles.content: Before welcoming Gulitti into the episode, Rosen and Roarke discuss the surging St. Louis Blues, who have won 10 games in a row, one short of tying a franchise record. Is it a hot streak, or are the … [+917 chars]
